title: SkiaBitmap in xaml fine
body:
### Description

It may not be a bug, but it is unable to configure.  I looked at Bitmap Rotator as a sample, but I need to figure out why it works there.
[Cyclone.zip](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/files/12572007/Cyclone.zip)


### Code

There is only one element in the window, but it is failing. It fails at InitializeComponent ();
[Cyclone.zip](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/files/12572031/Cyclone.zip)


### Expected Behavior

It should display

### Actual Behavior

It fails at InitializeComponent ();

### Version of SkiaSharp

2.88.3 (Current)

### Last Known Good Version of SkiaSharp

2.88.2 (Previous)

### IDE / Editor

Visual Studio (Windows)

### Platform / Operating System

Windows
